attributes.action: address worrying research that reveals that Salmonella is becoming resistant to antibiotics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Liverpool, UK - 2 June 2008: Scientists at the University of Liverpool have found that Salmonella bacteria found in garden birds are sensitive to antibiotics, suggesting that the infection is unlike the bacteria found in livestock and humans.

Salmonella is increasingly resistant to antibiotics and can sometimes go undetected in animals, which increases the risk of the infection being spread to humans. Please address this.
